EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Credit Line Reactivation Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!Today}
{!Case.Contact}
{!Case.Account}
{!Account.BillingAddress}
Re: Credit Line Reactivation Request
Account Number#: *********{!Case.Masked_External_Account__c}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We received a request reactivate your account. In response to your request, a credit review was conducted. We will reactivate your account only if you agree to participate in our Direct Debit Payment program. Enclosed is some information about the Direct Debit Payment program, which involves paying your invoices electronically. To participate in the program, please complete the Authorization Agreement and email the completed form and voided check (not a deposit slip) to globalcredit@wexinc.com. If we do not receive a response from you within 14 days of the date of this letter, your account will be terminated.
Our reasons for not granting credit (or reactivating your account) under standard terms and conditions include the following:
A. Credit Line Usage
1. Slow or delinquent payment history in the last 12 months.
2. Limited or no actual usage in the last 6-12 months.
B. Business Credit
1. Delinquent past or present credit obligations.
2. Unsatisfactory financial conditions and/or rating.
3. Insufficient information.
4. Presence of suits, liens, or judgments.
C. Financial Information
1. Unsatisfactory conditions present.
2. Insufficient financial strength to support original credit line.
3. Updated financial statements have not been received.
D. Other
1. Supportive or additional information has not been received.
2. Adverse information received from outside sources.
Sincerely,
Credit Services
WEX Bank
